biotools.summary: opentree is a Python package for accessing and analyzing data from the Open Tree of Life. This package is a python library designed to make it easier to work with web services and data resources associated with the Open Tree of Life project.

bioschemas.name: opentree
bioschemas.summary: opentree is a Python package for accessing and analyzing data from the Open Tree of Life. This package is a python library designed to make it easier to work with web services and data resources associated with the Open Tree of Life project.
